source.buildSpec:
version: 0.2
env:
  shell: bash
  variables:
    CI: "true"
    GITHUB_TOKEN: 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

      nodejs: "14"

      - yarn install
  build:

      - echo "COMMIT_SHA=${CODEBUILD_RESOLVED_SOURCE_VERSION}" > commit.txt
